anya-e0105n35:1_0: Jātakaṭṭhakathāpi ca ācariyabuddhaghosatthereneva katāti vadanti, kāraṇaṁ panettha
anya-e0105n35:1_1: na dissati. Sā pana atthadassittherena ca buddhamittattherena ca mahisāsakanikāyikena
anya-e0105n35:1_2: ca buddhadevattherenāti tīhi therehi abhiyācito mahāvihāravāsīnaṁ vācanāmaggaṁ nissāya
anya-e0105n35:1_3: katā. Imissāpi nāmaviseso natthi. Vuttaṁ himissā ārambhe –
anya-e0105n35:11: Bhāsissaṁ bhāsato taṁ me, sādhu gaṇhantu sādhavo’’ti.
anya-e0105n35:12: Ettāvatā ca ācariyabuddhaghosattherassa ganthabhāvena pākaṭāhi sabbaṭṭhakathāhi saha visuddhimaggassa karaṇappakāro vitthārena vibhāvito hoti.
